it.unimi.di.law.warc.records

Class HttpRequestWarcRecord

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.http.message.AbstractHttpMessage
      • it.unimi.di.law.warc.records.AbstractWarcRecord
        • it.unimi.di.law.warc.records.HttpRequestWarcRecord
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    WarcRecord, HttpMessage, HttpRequest

    public class HttpRequestWarcRecord
extends AbstractWarcRecord
implements HttpRequest
    An implementation of WarcRecord corresponding to a WarcRecord.Type.REQUEST record type.
